summary: The Lonely Mountain Lookout is the perfect abode for those who do not want to be found. It is also great for anyone who is smithing inclined.
descriptionHtml:
The lonely Mountain is located about halfway between Whiterun and Rorikstead. The lookout is on the top of the mountain within a set of ruins.

Location features:

Cental Skyrim location.
Easy access to shrines.
Good hunting ground.
Great view.

But inside...

You will find an ancient armory with the ancient forge at its heart!
Weapon racks (an entire hall of them)
Shield racks (a hall of them too)
9 armor mannequins
An epic dining hall
Alchemy table, satchel, and potion chest.
Enchanting table, satchel and item chest.
a bedroom with dressers.
7 bookshelves.
A smelter.
4 display cases.
and plenty of other storage.

This mod is mainly for players who want to specialize in smithing. You'll have to work a little bit to unlock everything (dont want to make it too easy) but its totally worth it to get the full use of this Player house.

Update! This player house has now been fully navmeshed! Companions should have no problem navagating through it.
author: Modelmode
